original_title: Blaze Bayley & Thomas Zwijsen - live @ The Asylum in Birmingham 2012
overview: setlist: Lord Of The Flies (Iron Maiden) - The Launch - Truth Is Revealed - Meant To Be - Stare At The Sun - I Like It Hot (Wolfsbane) - One More Step - Man On The Edge (Iron Maiden) - Como Estais Amigos - Doctor Doctor (UFO) all songs are arranged by Thomas Zwijsen.
title: Blaze Bayley & Thomas Zwijsen - live @ The Asylum in Birmingham 2012
